com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validation

Class WFieldErrorIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validation.AbstractWFieldIndicator
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validation.WFieldErrorIndicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WComponent, WebComponent, Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    1.4.0 This component has never been supported in the front end code. It has never worked and is incompatible with WValidationErrors. It will be deleted asap.

    public class WFieldErrorIndicator
extends AbstractWFieldIndicator

    This component is used to render errors relating to an individual field. Generally, this is placed next to the input field to help highlight the individual fields that are in error. An instance of the indicator is automatically provided when adding a field to a WFieldLayout.

    Author:
    Adam Millard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
